enum: Deed of Variation Trust or Family Arrangement
Flat Management Company or Sinking Fund
Previously there was only an absolute interest under the will

periodTaxDues.description: 01-Total Income Tax and Capital Gains due for the administration period more than £10,000, 02-Date of Death before 05 April 2016 and the sale of estates assets by administrators is £225,000 in any  one tax year, 03-Date of Death After 05 April 2016 and the sale of estates assets by administrators is £250.00 in any one tax year, 04-Estate worth more than 2.5 million at the death of death

monetaryType.description: Integer up to 12 digits max; 1250 represents 1250 pounds
